shadow.name: DOUBT
shadow.description: The shadow frequency of After Completion, expressing through doubt

gift.name: INQUIRY
gift.description: The gift frequency of After Completion, expressing through inquiry

siddhi.name: TRUTH
siddhi.description: The siddhi frequency of After Completion, expressing through truth

inversion_protocols.script: This is Gate 63 shadow frequency. The doubt you're experiencing is a distortion of your natural inquiry. Through awareness and experimentation, you can shift from doubt to inquiry.
inversion_protocols.somatic_anchor: Feel into your head. Notice the sensation of doubt.

experiment.hypothesis: If I work with Gate 63 consciously for 7 days, the doubt pattern will shift toward inquiry.
experiment.action: Daily practice working with Gate 63 energy.

success_criteria.target: Noticeable shift from doubt toward inquiry
